channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 元Meta副社長（メディア・パートナーシップ担当）のキャンベル・ブラウンが、AI企業とメディアを結ぶマーケットプレイスを構築する新興企業TollBitのシニアアドバイザーに就任（Sara Fischer/Axios
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Campbell Brown, ex-Meta VP of media partnerships, becomes senior adviser for TollBit, a startup building a marketplace between AI companies and media outlets  —  Media veteran Campbell Brown is joining TollBit as a senior adviser, Brown told Axios.  The startup is building a marketplace between AI companies and media outlets.

item.title: ブラジルの報道の自由をめぐり、ジャーナリストが懸念を表明、最高裁が一部の取材に対する責任を認める判決、敵対的な裁判官、収監された記者などが原因（ロイター・インスティチュート）
item.description:
Reuters Institute:
Journalists raise concerns over press freedom in Brazil, due to a Supreme Court ruling on liability over some interviews, hostile judges, and a jailed reporter  —  A reporter's prison sentence and a controversial Supreme Court ruling fuel concerns among reporters and journalism associations

item.title: ロビンフッドが独立系メディアブランド「シャーウッドニュース」を立ち上げ、ジョシュア・トポルスキーが編集長に就任（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Robinhood launches its independent media brand Sherwood News, with Joshua Topolsky as editor-in-chief  —  - It plans to focus on ad sales before expanding to other revenue streams, like events. … The content produced by Sherwood is editorially independent, says Topolsky …

item.title: Puckが世界のアート市場に関するサブスタックのニュースレターArtelligenceを買収。
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Puck acquires Artelligence, a Substack newsletter about the global art market with 32K free and paid subscribers; Puck now has 17 journalists and 12 newsletters  —  Puck has acquired Artelligence, a Substack newsletter about the global art market authored by veteran art director …

item.title: BDGメディアのナイロンは、2017年に印刷版を中止して以来、初の物理的な雑誌を今月発売する。
item.description:
Axios:
BDG Media's Nylon will release its first physical magazine this month since stopping print editions in 2017; the company plans biannual editions going forward  —  The music-themed issue coincides with its annual “Nylon House” experience at the Coachella music festival this weekend.

item.title: 情報源ABC、CBS、CNN、NBC、Fox Newsがバイデン大統領とトランプ前大統領に選挙前のテレビ討論を促す書簡を作成（Michael M Grynbaum/New York Times）
item.description:
Michael M. Grynbaum / New York Times:
Sources: ABC, CBS, CNN, NBC, and Fox News draft a letter urging President Biden and former President Trump to do televised debates ahead of the election  —  Speculation has swirled in the political world about whether the presumptive candidates will agree to the traditional face-to-face events, a campaign staple since 1976.

item.title: NPRの25年のベテラン編集者は、「オープンマインドな精神」はもはやそこには存在しないとし、ジョン・ランシング元最高経営責任者が2020年から人種とアイデンティティに焦点を当てたことを非難している（Uri Berliner/The Free Press）
item.description:
Uri Berliner / The Free Press:
A 25-year veteran editor at NPR says an “open-minded spirit” no longer exists there and blames ex-CEO John Lansing's focus on race and identity starting in 2020  —  Uri Berliner, a veteran at the public radio institution, says the network lost its way when it started telling listeners how to think.

item.title: SAG-AFTRAは、俳優のデジタル複製を使用する際に詳細な同意を必要とするカリフォルニア州の法案と、相続人の同意なしに死亡した俳優を使用することを禁止する別の法案を推進している（Gene Maddaus/Variety）
item.description:
Gene Maddaus / Variety:
SAG-AFTRA is pushing for a CA bill requiring detailed consent to use actors' digital replicas and another banning use of dead performers without heirs' consent  —  Would you buy a car from an AI chatbot?  What if it looked and talked like Tom Hanks?

item.title: YouTubeがショッピング機能を追加、ユーザーが閲覧できるクリエイター監修の商品リスト「Shopping Collections」や、手数料率の情報を掲載したハブなど（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
YouTube adds shopping features, including creator-curated product lists for users to browse called Shopping Collections and a hub with info on commission rates  —  YouTube announced on Tuesday that it's launching new Shopping features that allow creators to curate shoppable collections …

item.title: ロビンフッドが独立系メディアブランド「シャーウッドニュース」を立ち上げ、ジョシュア・トポルスキーが編集長に就任（Walter Hickey/@walthickey）
item.description:
Walter Hickey / @walthickey:
Robinhood launches its independent media brand Sherwood News, with Joshua Topolsky as editor-in-chief  —  Today we launched Sherwood News! Here's some of the features we launched today!

item.title: BBCがインド事業を分離し、独立した新メディア会社「Collective Newsroom」を設立、モディ氏のドキュメンタリーに対する規制当局の監視を受ける（John Reed/Financial Times）
item.description:
John Reed / Financial Times:
The BBC splits off its India operations to create a new independent media company, Collective Newsroom, following regulatory scrutiny over its Modi documentary  —  Move follows controversy about Modi documentary, which was labelled a ‘propaganda piece’ by New Delhi

item.title: ニューズ・コープ、2023年7月2日までの1年間で、ザ・サン紙の売上高は5％減の3億520万ポンド、損失は48％減の6590万ポンド、タイムズ紙の売上高は3％増の3億8580万ポンド、利益は17％減と報告（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
News Corp reports The Sun revenue down 5% to £305.2M, losses down 48% to £65.9M in the year to July 2, 2023, The Times revenue up 3% to £385.8M, profit down 17%  —  2022/2023 financial results for Times Media, News Group Newspapers and News UK Broadcasting.

item.title: サウスカロライナ対アイオワの女子NCAAタイトルマッチは、4月7日に18.7Mの視聴者を集め、女子大学の試合としては新記録、あらゆるバスケットボールの試合としては5年ぶりの高水準となった。
item.description:
Axios:
South Carolina-Iowa women's NCAA title game drew 18.7M viewers on April 7, a new record for a women's college game and a five-year high for any basketball game  —  - Her star power helped make this women's basketball season the most-watched in fifteen years.

item.title: フォーチュン』誌はアナスタシア・ニルコフスカヤ氏をCEOに指名し、アラン・マレー氏の後任として同誌を率いる初の女性となった。
item.description:
Katie Robertson / New York Times:
Fortune names Anastasia Nyrkovskaya as its CEO, making her the first woman to lead the publication, taking over Alan Murray; she had been CFO and CSO since 2019  —  “The overarching goal for the company is growth,” Anastasia Nyrkovskaya said in an interview.Carly Zavala for The New York Times

item.title: YouTubeチャンネル「Dude Perfect」がハイマウント・キャピタルから1億ドル以上を調達し、新分野での事業展開とコア番組の拡大を図る（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
YouTube channel Dude Perfect raised $100M+ from Highmount Capital to build out their business in new areas and expand their core programming  —  The Dudes plan to use the cash infusion “to pursue bold new opportunities and projects” beyond traditional channels.
